name: uts_sem5-workspace
description: Workspace runner to start Laravel, Express WebSocket and React dev server together

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && php artisan serve --host=127.0.0.1 --port=8000" "node ./scripts/start-envoy.js" "cd grpc-service && npm run server:start" "cd grpc-service && npm run grpc:start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:simple: concurrently "cd backend && php artisan serve --host=127.0.0.1 --port=8000" "cd grpc-service && npm run server:start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm --prefix grpc-service install && npm --prefix frontend install && (cd backend && echo 'Run composer install in backend if needed')
